fields.name: Phishing
fields.description: Fraudulent attempts to obtain sensitive information by disguising as a trustworthy entity in electronic communication.

fields.name: Identity Theft
fields.description: The deliberate use of someone else's identity to gain a financial advantage or obtain credit and other benefits.

fields.name: Ransomware
fields.description: A type of malicious software designed to block access to a computer system until a sum of money is paid.

fields.name: Data Breach
fields.description: A security incident in which sensitive, protected or confidential data is copied, transmitted, viewed, stolen or used by an unauthorized individual.

fields.name: Online Harassment
fields.description: The use of electronic communications to bully a person, typically by sending messages of an intimidating or threatening nature.

fields.name: Hacking
fields.description: Unauthorized access to data in a system or computer.

fields.name: Online Fraud
fields.description: Deception deliberately practiced to secure unfair or unlawful gain via internet services or software.

fields.name: Malware Distribution
fields.description: The spreading of software that is specifically designed to disrupt, damage, or gain unauthorized access to a computer system.
